sentence.Network_en: The obverse of rising unemployment is continued gains in productivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 失业率上升，相对应的是生产率进一步提高。

sentence.Network_en: The result has been a giant leap in productivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 其结果是生产力的大幅提高。

sentence.Network_en: Wages were rising faster than productivity and this was eating into profits.
sentence.Network_cn: 工资的涨幅高过了生产率增长的速度，从而消耗了利润所得。

entry.tran: 生产力；生产率；生产能力
entry.def: Productivity is the rate at which goods are produced.

example.ex: The third-quarter results reflect continued improvements in productivity...
example.tran: 第三季度的结果表明生产率持续上升。

example.ex: His method of obtaining a high level of productivity is demanding.
example.tran: 他那种提高生产率的方法实施起来非常困难。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being productive or having the power to produce
2. (economics) the ratio of the quantity and quality of units produced to the labor per unit of time

auth_sentence.content: In adults, it causes fatigue and lost productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content: In adults, it causes fatigue and lost productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In adults, it causes fatigue and lost productivity.

auth_sentence.content: It blames this poor performance on low labour productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It blames this poor performance on low labour productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It blames this poor performance on low labour productivity.

auth_sentence.content: This is not really much in terms of productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not really much in terms of productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not really much in terms of productivity.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易拉长的,易变形的,可塑的
stems_affixes.word_buile: duct引导,带来+ile能……的→能引导的→可塑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ive……的→adj.生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
via路+duct引导,带来→引导路的路
con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体
stems_affixes.word_buile: conduct引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导+or人或物器→n.管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
stems_affixes.word_buile: educt=educe[v.引出;演绎]+ion表名词→n.引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ivity表名词→n.生产率
seduct=seduce[v.勾引,诱惑]+ion动作或状态→n.诱惑
vent风,通风+i+duct引导,带来→引导通风

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥
in进入+duct引导,带来→引进→引导

Sentence.sentence: In a division of electronic engineers, who were designing equipments so advanced that they work in teams of up to 150, co-workers and managers were asked to nominate the standouts- the stars in productivity and effectiveness
Engineers, scientists and agriculturalists have the knowledge, tools and systems that will assist in achieving productivity increases
If no penalty is imposed on an employee for poor performance, other employees may react by reducing their productivity as well.

sentences.en: Computers have greatly increased productivity in business offices.
sentences.cn: 计算机大大提高了商务办公室的工作效率。

jushi.english: Computers have greatly increased productivity in business offices.
